name: Shrimp & Sausage & Grits
description: Creamy cheddar cheese grits topped with sautéed shrimp, spicy andouille sausage, and crispy bacon.
instructions: Prepare the Grits: In a pot, bring water and chicken broth to a boil. Gradually whisk in grits and kosher salt. Reduce heat to low, cover, simmer, stirring occasionally, 30-35 min until tender. Remove from heat, stir in butter and cheese until melted. Cover.
Cook the Bacon: In a large skillet, cook chopped bacon over medium heat until crispy (6-8 min). Transfer bacon to paper towels, reserving ~1/4 tbsp bacon grease in skillet.
Brown the Sausage: Add sliced sausage to the reserved bacon grease. Cook over medium heat until browned (4-5 min). Remove sausage, set aside.
Sauté the Shrimp: Add minced garlic and half the green onions to the skillet. Sauté 1 min until fragrant. Add shrimp, cook until pink (2-3 min per side).
Season Shrimp: Drizzle shrimp with lemon juice, add hot sauce to taste. Season with salt & pepper as needed.
Combine and Serve: Spoon grits into bowls. Top with shrimp, sausage, and bacon. Garnish with remaining green onions. Serve immediately.
cookNotes: Stir grits occasionally while simmering to prevent sticking and lumps.
Reserved bacon grease adds significant flavor to the sausage and shrimp.
Adjust hot sauce to your preferred level of spiciness.
